turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'm dying. Can you order me a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes absolutely. What can I get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want an iced salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yum. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotcha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Omg I think I want a venti actually. . . .no that is gross. Keep it a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, grande it is. Does that have milk in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it does. I want almond milk but I am fine with the dairy whip on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, grande iced salted caramel with almond milk and whipped. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you have them add an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I would be happy to do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What store do you want to make this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you call it into the Hudson Starbucks on 91?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure can! Ok, grande salted caramel with an extra shot of espresso, almond milk, and whipped cream to the Hudson store on 91.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. That sounds so good. I can't wait!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just want to confirm with you that your drink has been ordered and they said it will be ready for you to pickup in 15 minute.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic! I am going to head out to pick it up in just a minute.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful! I hope it is just the pick me up that you need. Have a great day, boss!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, you too!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!

items.name: I want an iced salted cara
